title: Kate Hudson: Matt Bellamy and I wanted different things from life
text:
Kate Hudson: Matt Bellamy and I wanted different things from life Kate Hudson: Matt Bellamy and I wanted different things from life 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
Hollywood beauty Kate Hudson has finally opened up about why her relationship with Muse rocker Matt Bellamy ended. 
The 36-year-old actress quietly split from her musician fiance in 2014 and has revealed why they decided against tying the knot in a new interview. 
Speaking to Allure magazine, she said that they had simply wanted different things. Announcing our November cover star, Kate Hudson! Here, her thoughts on being happy: http://t.co/OuCGbdq29R pic.twitter.com/iatDqUmZjX 
— Allure (@Allure_magazine) October 15, 2015 
“Relationships ending are painful, and you can choose to carry that or you can choose to reframe it,” she said. 
“If Matt and I had a great relationship, we would still be together, but we chose to move on because we had different visions of how we wanted to live our lives. 
“That doesn’t mean, though, that we can’t rebuild something that would be the best thing for the kids.” (Evan Agostini/Invision) 
The pair have four-year-old son Bingham together, while Kate has a son Ryder, 11, from her previous marriage to Chris Robinson. 
The How To Lose A Guy In 10 Days star said the most important thing was to “stay connected” for the sake of her children. 
“We said, ‘We need to try to create something for the kids where they feel like they’re gaining something rather than losing something’. 
“It’s been a seamless transition. Kids just want to see their parents be cool. Everybody’s cool; everybody’s good.” These are the natural beauty products Kate Hudson swears by: http://t.co/vbyuR9kq1T pic.twitter.com/6GMAB3ru92 
— Allure (@Allure_magazine) October 16, 2015 
The big screen star also told the November issue of the magazine about her latest role in Rock The Kasbah, where she plays a prostitute on the verge of retirement who gets involved with an ageing music producer, played by Bill Murray. 
Kate said she had no problem doing romantic scenes with the 65-year-old actor. Share article 
“I love to kiss Bill Murray,” she said. “He’s still sexy!” Promoted Stories
